ourServices.heading: OUR SERVICES
ourServices.description: With over 15 years experience and real focus on customer satisfaction, you can rely on us for your next home/building waterproofing or thermal insulation.

costOfServices.heading: COST OF SERVICES
costOfServices.description: Use our online form to get a preliminary estimate of your service cost.

ourProducts.heading: OUR PRODUCT LINES
ourProducts.contactForPricing: Please contact us for pricing on this product

floorTenax.name: Floor Tenax Speedy
floorTenax.description: Fiber-reinforced, fast-setting micro concrete for floor restoration

sanadek.name: Sanadek
sanadek.description: Non-toxic, breathable, interior paint with lime putty

ourProjects.heading: OUR PROJECTS
ourProjects.description: Just give us a call, and our consultants will reach out quickly. We'll analyze your issue and offer the best, most cost-effective solution at no charge for the assessment. All you need to do is review and approve our proposal.

aboutUs.heading: ABOUT US
aboutUs.description: We provide waterproofing and thermal insulation for all types of buildings—from homes and small businesses to large corporations. Our trained team delivers professional installations with a strong focus on quality and customer satisfaction.

constructionManagement.title: Construction Management
constructionManagement.description: We combine quality, workmanship, knowledge & low prices to provide you with services unmatched by our competitors.

bestMaterials.title: Best Materials
bestMaterials.description: We have the personnel, experience and the right resources to make a project run smoothly. We guarantee that a work is done on time.

professionalStandards.title: Professional Standards
professionalStandards.description: Working with us involve a carefully planned series of steps. It is centered around a schedule we stick to and daily communication.

whyChoose.heading: WHY CHOOSE IZOGRUP SH.P.K
whyChoose.description: Founded by Oligert & Erion Plaka back in 2004, Izogrup has established itself as one of the greatest & prestigious providers of waterproofing & thermal insulation services in Albania.

contactBanner.heading: CONTACT US
contactBanner.subheading: Learn More About Working With IZOGRUP

productsPage.completeRange: A Complete Range Of Products And Technologies For The Building Industry
